detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: With 30 years of experience, Denver personal injury lawyer Jennifer Donaldson has shown her commitment and ingenuity in representing her clients in the Denver area and throughout the state of Colorado.

detailsData.title: Personalized Attention
detailsData.content: Donaldson Law, LLC provides personalized attention to each case, ensuring that every client's situation is thoroughly understood and appropriately addressed.

detailsData.title: Contingency Basis
detailsData.content: Services are offered on a contingency basis, meaning clients do not have to worry about upfront costs for legal representation, allowing them to focus on recovery.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Practice Areas
detailsData.content: The firm handles a wide range of personal injury cases, from auto accidents to wrongful death, ensuring clients receive expert legal support regardless of their situation.

address: 3200 Cherry Creek S. Dr., Suite 520 Denver, CO 80209
valueProp: At Donaldson Law, LLC, our personal injury lawyers in Denver have been helping people in Colorado for more than 30 years. We're here to support you if you've been hurt because of someone else's mistake. We know that getting hurt can turn your life upside down, affecting your body, emotions, and money. That's why our team works on personalized solutions for each person we help. We understand that your situation is not just another case to us—it's a unique challenge that we want to help you with.

testimonalData.text: Jennifer and her team were fantastic. They guided me through the whole process after getting into a car accident. She fought for me, and gave me and my family the best support.
testimonalData.author: Tony D.

testimonalData.text: I was hit by a car while I was in a crosswalk. Afterward, I underwent multiple surgeries and occupational therapy. I was out of work after losing the use of my hand for a period of time.
testimonalData.author: Zander O.

testimonalData.text: My wife was involved in a serious auto accident where she sustained serious injuries, including a traumatic brain injury. Ms. Donaldson was professional, compassionate and very thorough from beginning to end.
testimonalData.author: Lance W
